content: twist & vote by rosemary romi hill this hat is a gift from me to you designed for the #warmtheline 2022 election project i also designed one for 2020 knit one or two or three up and keep someone warm while they wait in line to vote it only takes one 110 yard skein of dk wool and it s a wardrobe staple a quick and simple knit with a great twist thank you for knitting my patterns and supporting indie pattern design use #romiphyle and #romihill or #romidesigns to connect on social media 09202022 size medium measurements circumference 22 inches/approx 55 8 cm length 8 inches/approx 20 3 cm materials dk weight wool approximately 110 yards/1 75 oz 100m /50g one skein 2 each - sets 16-inch circular knitting needles circs in us 7/4 5mm and us 5/3 75mm or 1 each - set double pointed knitting needles dpns in us 7/4 5mm and us 5/3 75mm stitch markers tapestry needle optional smooth cotton waste yarn optional crochet hook for waste yarn optional us #2/3mm 16-24 inch circular needle gauge 20 sts/28 row = 4 /10cm in stockinette stitch on us 7/4 5mm after blocking every knitter s gauge is different please check gauge my favorite cast-on for hats tubular 8 in/ co 54 provisionally with waste yarn by crocheting 20 3 cm onto us 2 knitting needle a different provisional cast-on may be substituted round 1 set-up row switch to working yarn k1 yo to end pm and join to work in round 108 sts 22 in/ 55 8 cm switch to smaller needle mentioned in materials pattern round 2 sl wyib p1 to end round 3 k1 sl wyif to end set-up with smaller needles and cast-on of choice co 108 after round 3 work ribbing section waste yarn sts place marker and join to knit in the round being may be removed after first round of ribbing and careful not to twist cast-on pattern worked as written ribbing round 1 k1 tbl p1 to end of round finishing rounds 2-8 repeat round 1 break yarn thread yarn through blunt tapestry needle and pass yarn end through live stitches and into interior switch to larger needles of hat remove needles and sew in end body of hat wash using wool wash remove excess water from hat round 1 k51 k2tog place marker yo knit to 3 sts and block using a balloon to shape hat allow to dry from end of round k2tog place marker yo k1 slip thoroughly sew in ends wear and enjoy end of round marker round 2 knit to 2 sts before marker k2tog sl m yo 2 times knit to end of round marker sl m abbreviations work round 2 an additional 25 times co cast on k knit k tbl knit through back loop to twist stitch crown shaping decreases k2tog right leaning decrease knit 2 stitches together round 1 knit to 4 sts before marker k2tog 2 times sl pm
